Laptops That Bring Out the Best In You

While tablets and smartphones are still popular, most people agree that everything, from doing research for an assignment to playing hardcore games, works better on a laptop. It doesn't matter what your lifestyle is, there is always one for you at Croma.

                    In today's world, a laptop is a very useful device that can help you complete an assignment, edit pictures, browse the web, play a game, watch a movie, and do a variety of other things. This portable and simple-to-use device allows you to work from home or anywhere, reducing travel time.

Know Your
Laptops

Your Laptop, Your Use

The Croma Advantage

Smartphones have taken over most of our screen time. Even Tablets are being designed to replace Laptops. Even as the ubiquitous bricks and slabs are getting more and more powerful with each passing week, there’s always going to be a need for a real computer. For most people this typically means a Laptop.

                          Even the most digitally-forward folks will admit that there’s no real substitute for a keyboard and big screen. Tasks like creating spreadsheets or presentations, editing photos or videos are far more easily accomplished on a Laptop than on a Tablet or indeed a Mobile Phone. What Laptop is right for you depends on a variety of factors: what exactly you plan on using it for, how often you intend to use it, and (most importantly) what’s your budget. Buying Laptop involves a lot of research and Croma is here to help you find the right one.

How do you choose a Laptop?

Which is the best laptop for you depends on a variety of factors: what exactly you plan on using it for, how often you intend to use it, and (most importantly) what’s your budget. Whether you’re looking for a budget Laptop or a high-end workhorse, we will help you find the right Laptop online or in-store.


By their very nature, Laptops are designed to be portable. 15.6-inch screen size is standard in most Laptops but smaller screen sizes – think 12 to 14 inches – make a Laptop more portable. This is also the size that’s preferred by most: no matter whether you’re a student or a working professional. However, gamers and content creators, tend to seek higher specs and faster processors to keep up with their usage. Laptop prices differ depending on specs (RAM, storage, processor, etc.) screen size, technology and other specs.
